Maximize your dealership’s productivity with the Desklog.ai Chrome Extension! This innovative tool brings your road to the sale right to your browser, providing essential features to streamline your sales process and enhance customer interactions.

Key Features:

Live Chat: Communicate with sales managers in real time without leaving your customer’s side. Speed up negotiations and close deals faster.

Document Management: Easily upload stips and other documents to the deal. Managers can also upload current pencils or sales quotes without switching desking tools, keeping your process seamless and efficient.

TO Requests: Send SMS notifications to available managers with customer details, ensuring timely introductions and smooth transitions.

With the Desklog.ai Chrome Extension, your sales team can stay focused, efficient, and effective, all within the familiar environment of your browser. Enhance your sales process and improve customer satisfaction with this powerful tool.

Install now and experience the future of dealership sales productivity!
